Question: After a month, concerned about loss of control back in France, this person and his army left.
Hints: This person said: "My true glory is not to have won 40 battles...Waterloo will erase the memory of so many victories. ..
When **** proposed the army march on the capital, his marshals decided to mutiny.
This person asserted the army would follow him, and Ney replied the army would follow its generals.
